short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your friendly assistant for responding to reviews for your business.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uses AI to generate thoughtful responses to reviews for your business. 

Simply highlight the review text from any site,  right click to open Chrome's context menu and in seconds your AI Assistant will generate a thoughtful response! If needed, edit the response to your liking submit as you usually would.

Works on every website that has reviews, such as Google, Expedia, and Yelp.
